content.text: Hi, thanks for asking. Ender's Game is my favorite book.
Wow, I've heard of that before. What's it about?
It's about a boy who is recruited to fight an alien race. He's very young and has a lot of pressure on him.
That sounds like a good book. I may have to check it out.
I think you would like it. What's your favorite book?
I don't know if I have a favorite book. I like a lot of different books.
What are some of your favorites?
I like the Harry Potter series. I also like The Hunger Games series.
I've heard good things about the Harry Potter series. I've never read any of them though.
You should read them! They're really good.
I might have to check them out.
You should. You won't regret it.
